Dialogue.Page: My name is Nylox. I don't know how anybody would have gotten here, consider yourself lucky.
Our ship randomly exploded without reason. Some supernatural force is at play here.
We are destined to die here. If you are translating this, know this:
I have installed buttons on this recorder with the help of my friend Quiax.
Each button does something different. It will give all the information I know.
The Ghost Moon, to my knowledge, is an object comprised of 4D matter.
When it moves around the system, it changes size as it moves across the 4th dimension into our plane of existence.
However, when it is in this position, it is perfectly aligned with the 3rd dimension.
The 4D matter is what kills living beings. You can't see it... but it's there. And it's deadly.
I have to admit... I did delete some archives from the Outer Space Station.
It was too dangerous. So at least I thought. Now I realize that it's safe.
Quiax was the one who found out about the safety of this location.
The machine on board the station didn't process any 4D matter when getting the data.
That's how we found out it was safe.
I am a Nomai. Three eyes and some horns and fur. We are known for being an interstellar civilization.
Before we got trapped here, though, I had crashed previously on a planet we named Wher.
The whole system was extremely weird. Five stars packed tightly together. A strange teleporting moon that was purple.
We crashed twice in one trip.
I hope I can see my parents soon...
Darvy was basically a brother to me. He was a scientist with brilliant ideas, though a little crazy.
I remember the day I found out he had died from toying around with 4D matter.
I don't have the words to describe it.
But I was honored to find out that he wanted me to read his notebook. He always kept it secret.
So here I confess: I know something about the Ghost Moon that everybody else doesn't.
Darvy had found out that there is a link between the Ghost Moon and a planet outside of... wherever we are.
He found that out in an experiment just before he died. He asked me to build a machine to access that link.
And... that's what I did. Darvy was smart, he wrote down all the steps required to build it.
Even though I did have to ask Quiax to help a little... I still kept it secret.
The building is somewhere on this planet. It harnesses the 4D matter in the core to access the link.
Be careful.
(shutting down)
